participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and outgoing, enjoys physical activities and staying fit.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly. eating is something i do when i'm bored. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, loves helping animals and giving back to the community.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
